name: The Journalist (itch)
description:
It's not easy to become successful Journalist.

So when there is the opportunity you have to go for it!

But be careful with your coffee, there are rumors that the Big Boss doesn't like people who drink a lot of coffee. Weird right?

I would suggest you to minimize the use of coffee and to not waste your precious energy on some typos. Just to be sure. 

Also, don't forget to share your awesome articles on Twitter!

------------------------------------------

This game was made in 72 hours during Ludum Dare 39. It was my 3rd finished Ludum Dare game but it was the first time I attended on my own, and to be honest probably the one I enjoyed the most working on.

I was not able to finish in 48 hours but I am more than very happy with the outcome :).  As always with Ludum Dare game there are a lot of things I am looking forward to improve in the next ones. This time it was mainly the audio part of the game. Hopefully it will be better next time :D

I hope you will enjoy.

P.S. There is ~10k words so happy typing :D
P.S.S. There is only windows build right now, but I will most likely add others later today :)
